vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with Black & Veatch Corporation to provide additional engineering services necessary for work associated with the Dallas Water Utilities Wastewater Facilities and Operations Strategic Plan - Not to exceed $206,205.00, from $3,498,000.00 to $3,704,205.00 - Financing: Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund
